segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment identifying the declaration type and reference.

segment.name: Customs status of goods
segment.documentation: CST, A segment identifying the customs procedure and status of the goods relevant to the whole message.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place or location relevant to the entire message. For example, office of assessment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates, times or periods relevant to the whole message. For example, period covered by the declaration.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying the various indicators required by a customs system. For example, special programs.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying an account and a related financial institution relevant to the whole message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying various references relevant to the whole message.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the various references relevant to the whole message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date related to the previous RFF segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the parties relevant to the whole message, with their related references, contacts and communication numbers.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the parties relevant to the entire message. For example, importer, ultimate consignee, etc.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references relating to the party specified within the group. For example, a special mailing request number for refunds relating to the customs transaction.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments identifying the contacts and communication numbers relevant to the NAD.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person(s) or department(s) associated with the party specified in SG2.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying the phone number, fax number or other communications number of the party and/or contact specified within SG2.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying monetary amounts, currencies and their exchange rates, when required for the whole periodic declaration.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary function and up to five monetary amounts.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments identifying currencies, a rate of exchange and a related date for a monetary amount identified within this group.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying currencies and the rate of exchange for a monetary amount identified within this group.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date related to the information contained in the CUX.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments identifying duties/taxes/fees and methods of payment related to the whole periodic declaration.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying the tax type, rate and base associated with the periodic declaration.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying monetary amounts (e.g. tax/fee amount) associated with the preceding TAX.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying an indicator (e.g. method payment indicator) associated with the preceding TAX.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment specifying control totals. For example, the number of simplified Customs declarations.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: SG11-SG12-SG14-SG15 A group of segments identifying detailed and complementary information of a previous simplified Customs declaration.

segment.name: Document/message summary
segment.documentation: DMS, A segment identifying the reference number of the previous simplified Customs declaration heading this group.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment specifying control totals within this group. E.g. the total number of Customs items, and values.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the various references relevant to the whole previous simplified Customs declaration.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date related to the whole previous simplified Customs declaration identified in DMS.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying any necessary processing indicators where these are required.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place or location related to the document identified in the DMS. E.g. Customs office of entry, country of purchase.

segment.name: Equipment details
segment.documentation: EQD, A segment identifying the equipment (e.g. container id) used to transport all the goods related to the whole declaration identified in DMS.

segment.name: Package
segment.documentation: PAC, A segment identifying the number and type of packages related to the whole declaration identified in DMS.

segment.name: Transport information
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment identifying the mode and means of transport used.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments identifying the parties relevant to the whole declaration identified in DMS, with their related references, contacts and communication numbers.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the parties relevant to the entire declaration. For example importer, ultimate consignee, etc.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying references relating to the party specified within the group. For example, a special mailing request number for refunds relating to the customs transaction.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments identifying the contacts and communication numbers relevant to the NAD.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a contact person(s) or department(s) associated with the party specified in SG8.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment identifying the phone number, fax number or other communications number of the party and (or) contact specified within SG8.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments identifying documentary requirements related to a previous simplified Customs declaration.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a document related to a previous simplified customs declaration (e.g. preference invoice etc.).

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates associated with the preceding DOC.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location associated with the preceding LOC.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the identity and address of the agency related to the documentary requirements.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments identifying the terms of delivery pertinent to the whole document.

segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
segment.documentation: TOD, A segment identifying, in a coded format, the terms of delivery relevant to the entire document.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location related to the information contained in the TOD.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment identifying the terms of delivery in narrative form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments identifying various monetary amounts, currencies and rates of exchange that pertain to the whole declaration.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying a monetary amount related to the whole declaration.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments identifying currencies, rate of exchange and an associated date.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying currency details and a rate of exchange related to the preceding MOA.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, The effective date of the rate of exchange reported in this group.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments identifying the totals and duty/tax/fee levels due for the declaration and summarizing this total by each accounting code included in the total due.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying the summary tax type, rates and base for a full declaration.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying amounts associated with the preceding TAX (e.g. total amounts for each duty/tax/fee).

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying an indicator related to the preceding TAX (e.g. summary method of payment).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 15: SG22-SG23-SG24-SG25-SG26-SG27-SG29 A group of segments identifying detailed information for a single customs item of a customs declaration.

segment.name: Customs status of goods
segment.documentation: CST, A segment identifying the customs tariff of the goods, their required treatment and, where these are different to the header information, the type of declaration and the current status of the goods.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment identifying the goods, related to the preceding CST.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the places relevant to a customs item. For example, country of origin, country of export, etc.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates particular to the customs item. For example, date of original exportation.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment identifying the necessary statistical information requirements related to a tariff number. For example, net weights, volumes, etc.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party particular to the customs item when required by customs. For example, manufacturer of the goods.

segment.name: Transport information
segment.documentation: TDT, A segment identifying transport details, for statistical purposes, on goods crossing statistical boundaries.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments identifying the number, type and reference of the packing units associated with the customs item.

segment.name: Package
segment.documentation: PAC, A segment identifying the number and type of packages relating to the customs item.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments identifying marks and labels, and giving the description of single packages associated with a customs item.

segment.name: Package identification
segment.documentation: PCI, A segment identifying markings and labels on the type of packages reported in the preceding PAC.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment describing the goods identified in PCI in narrative form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments identifying various monetary amounts, currencies and rates of exchange that pertain to the customs item.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the monetary amounts necessary for statistical and duty purposes.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments identifying currencies, a rate of exchange and an associated date related to the preceding MOA.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying currencies and the rate of exchange for an amount reported in the preceding MOA.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date related to the preceding CUX.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments identifying report documentary requirements of particular government agencies with the optional name and address of the agency involved, description and monetary amounts associated with a customs item.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a document related to a customs item.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying dates associated with the preceding DOC.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a location associated with the preceding DOC.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the identity and address of the agency related to the documentary requirement.

segment.name: Goods identity number
segment.documentation: GIN, A segment identifying any line or range of lines on the commercial document reported in the preceding RFF segment, that contains goods on this customs item.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying commercial document line monetary amounts where the Commercial Group is not offered but an administration requires this information.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments identifying a commercial description for a documented commodity that is associated with this customs line item.

segment.name: Item description
segment.documentation: IMD, A segment identifying the coded industry description of the merchandise on the document line(s) identified in the preceding GIN segment.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment identifying the documented merchandise in narrative form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments identifying references and dates relating to the customs item.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying particular references relating to the customs item. For example, the invoice number of any invoice that contains merchandise on this customs item.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date associated with the preceding RFF.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments identifying the terms of delivery pertinent to a customs item.

segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
segment.documentation: TOD, A segment identifying, in coded format, the terms of delivery of the entered goods, where these are specific to the customs item.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the place of delivery associated with the preceding TOD.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment identifying the terms of delivery in narrative form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments identifying the customs description of merchandise entered on a customs item.

segment.name: Nature of cargo
segment.documentation: GDS, A segment identifying a customs description, in coded format, of the goods declared on the customs item.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment identifying the customs description in narrative form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segments identifying special indicators or value data related to the customs item.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying any necessary processing indicators where these are required by customs at the item level.

segment.name: Percentage details
segment.documentation: PCD, A segment identifying percentage details related to adjustments where a relationship is identified between the buyer and seller.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date related the preceding GEI.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference related to the preceding GEI.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 26: A group of segments identifying duties/taxes/fees and methods of payment related to a customs item.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying the tax type, rate and base associated with a customs item.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying monetary amounts (e.g. tax/fee amount) associated with the preceding TAX.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying an indicator (e.g. method payment indicator) associated with the preceding TAX.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 27: A group of segments identifying variances between the quantity commercially documented and/or produced to Customs and the quantity declared.

segment.name: Quantity variances
segment.documentation: QVR, A segment identifying quantity difference and the reason for the difference between the declared and commercially documented amounts.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment identifying the quantity related to the preceding QVR.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 28: A group of segments identifying an earlier customs declaration in order to balance the total quantity declared with the total quantity presented to Customs.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying a reference to a previous customs declaration.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date associated with the preceding RFF.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 29: A group of segments identifying customs reporting requirements associated with a secondary tariff number.

segment.name: Related identification numbers
segment.documentation: GIR, A segment identifying the tariff number where the published tariff requires more than one tariff number.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying any necessary processing indicators related to the tariff number in the preceding GIR segment, where these are required by customs.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a party particular to the goods governed by the tariff number in the preceding GIR segment. For example, manufacturer of the goods.

segment.name: Measurements
segment.documentation: MEA, A segment identifying the necessary statistical information requirements related to the tariff number in the GIR segment. For example, net weight, volume, etc.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 30: A group of segments identifying various monetary amounts, currencies and rates of exchange that pertain to a secondary tariff number within a customs item.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the monetary amount necessary for statistical and/or duty purposes, as it relates to the tariff number in the preceding GIR segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 31: A group of segments identifying currencies, a rate of exchange and related date for an amount reported in the preceding MOA.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment identifying currencies and the rate of exchange for an amount reported in the preceding MOA segment.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date related to the preceding CUX.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 32: A group of segments identifying the duties, taxes, and/or fees pertinent to the tariff number reported in the GIR segment.

segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
segment.documentation: TAX, A segment identifying the tax type, rate and base associated with the preceding GIR.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment identifying monetary amounts (e.g. tax/fee amount) associated with the preceding TAX.

segment.name: Processing information
segment.documentation: GEI, A segment identifying an indicator associated with the preceding TAX, (e.g. method of payment indicator).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 33: A group of segments identifying specific documentary information which may be required by the tariff number in the GIR segment. For example, a textile category number.

segment.name: Document/message details
segment.documentation: DOC, A segment identifying a specific document related to the preceding GIR.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date associated with the preceding DOC.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a place associated with the preceding DOC.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the identity and address of the agency related to the documentary requirement.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 34: A group of segments permitting the verification of the authenticity of the sender and the integrity of the data.

segment.name: Authentication result
segment.documentation: AUT, A segment containing the result of the algorithm permitting the verification of the authenticity of the sender and the integrity of the data.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment identifying a date associated with the preceding AUT.
